long_description: The tough and functional Leatherman Squirt PS4 multi-tool combines the best of both worlds with its spring-action pliers and scissors. Measuring only 2.25 in. in length and weighing less than 2 oz., the Squirt PS4 is easy to take along. Contoured, anodized aluminum handle scales shield the durable stainless-steel body and implements. Regular pliers, needle-nose pliers, scissors, 3 screwdrivers, wire cutters, wood/metal file, straight knife and a bottle opener keep you equipped. Lanyard attachment makes it easy to attach the PS4 to a key ring or zipper. Leatherman Squirt PS4 multi-tool comes with removable split key ring attachment. Assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts.
short_description: The tough and functional Leatherman Squirt PS4 multi-tool combines the best of both worlds with its spring-action pliers and scissors.
